doc.field: This subseries contains material related to here is new york publicity and media relations, including press kits, clippings, and periodicals. Also included are office files of two PR staff members, as well as material pertaining to the publication of here is new york's book in 2002. CDs and DVDs contain here is new york images, footage of here is new york television press coverage, press kit and publicity material, and photos of here is new york exhibits and events. VHS tapes contain press coverage of here is new york in the U.S., Europe, and Japan.
Access to files on CDs and VHS tapes in this subseries is on HINY computer terminal at: HINY Collection Series I, III-V/Series V/Subseries 2
Series V: Office Files >> Subseries II: Public Relations
